overview: High Levels (2023) is a documentary production that focuses on Tom. Tom has diagnosed bipolar disorder and has battled with his mental health over the last decade of his life. He is an intelligent, composed, and rational person who ‘patrols’ the iconic bridges of Newcastle upon Tyne during his walks occurring around three o’clock in the morning. Here, he has come across numerous people who were contemplating on jumping, which he openly addresses in the documentary. Tom explains how he helps these people by listening to them and calling for support when needed.
title: High Levels
